0.description: If the Yankees would like to go any further in the postseason they better step up

1.description: Tigers are demolishing Yankees pitching tonight!

2.description: Yankees getting swept, that's great tv right there that's what that is I tell ya what

3.description: Yeah they do… “@gruber: Yankees have Tigers just where they want them.”

4.description: Tigers on the verge of a sweep, let's see now... Talk about the Yankees, of course!

5.description: I'm not going to celebrate the Tigers winning. I'm going to celebrate Yankees getting swept.

7.description: One more #Tigers! Let's nail that Yankees coffin shut!

8.description: The Yankees are absolutely embarrassing right now.

9.description: Bring out the brooms Detroit Tiger fans. #sweep the Yankees

10.description: Tigers are just disrespecting the Yankees.

13.description: Can the @tigers play the yankees every preseason? #killingit

14.description: #Tigers are taking it to the Yankees #sweep

15.description: Goodbye yankees, u r about to be swept. Plenty time now for ARod to pick up girls.#yankees #Tigers @detroittigers

16.description: Tigers are giving the Yankees their D 2nite

17.description: I think I speak for fans of 28 #MLB clubs when I say, thank you Detroit #Tigers! #Yankees

18.description: 8-1 Tigers lead heading into the ninth. Just three outs away from a sweep of the Yankees, and a berth in the World Series

19.description: Yankees on the verge of getting sweeped by the Tigers. #ALCS

21.description: Yep. @Yankees got swept. Off to the bar I go.

23.description: Devil's Night came early!! #Tigers sweep the #Yankees out of town. #ALCS

24.description: #GoTigers what a great day to be a Tigers fan! I'm sorry- who are the Yankees? #worldseries

25.description: And the Tigers sweep the Yankees! #ThisIsHowWeDoIt #ThisIsDetroit

26.description: Th #Tigers are going to the #WorldSeries!! Goodbye #yankees #postseason

28.description: The Detroit Tigers are the 2012 American League Champions after sweeping the Yankees 4 games to none.

29.description: Any day the Yankees get swept out of the playoffs has to be a good day

30.description: Great season by #Yankees. Good job by #Tigers going to #WorldSeries. #morebaseballplease

31.description: Swept Yankees. 2012 American League Champions. World Series. #Detroit #Tigers

32.description: Wow Tigers! Swept the Yankees and made it look easy.

34.description: Tigers are going to the #WorldSeries because they swept the Yankees.

35.description: That's what the fuck I'm talkin bout!!!! #Tigers #WorldSeries bring The D a championship!

36.description: 32. Tigers sweep Yankees to advance to the World Series. NYY has not been swept in postseason in 32 years.

37.description: Yankees swept! Triple Crown/world series winner this year? Maybe....

38.description: And the sweep of the Yankees!! #worldseries

40.description: THE YANKEES HAVE BEEN SWEPT BY THE TIGERS! YES YES YES!

41.description: Why do people hate the #Yankees ? They get swept out of the playoffs, and manage to trend worldwide, rather than #Tigers

42.description: Congrats to the @Tigers & @JustinVerlander for sweeping the @Yankees #EvilEmpire in #ALCS to advance the #WorldSeries

43.description: “@SportsCenter: BREAKING: @Tigers sweep @Yankees to advance to 11th World Series in franchise history. < 👏👏👏👏👏👏👍👍👍👍👍👍

44.description: S/o to the tigers for sweeping the Yankees 👏👏

45.description: TIGERS TIGERS TIGERS!! Bye bye yankees!!! #sweep #Tigers #ALChamps!!

46.description: Wow..... @Yankees could have tried to wear out the #tigers got the @Cardinals. #yougotowned #sweep #getoutthebrooms

48.description: Embarrassing that the YANKEES got swept by the tigers in the #ALCS

50.description: LOL  @espn: The Yankees haven’t been swept in a postseason series in 32 years. The Tigers just broke out the brooms.#sweep

51.description: THAT'S ALL, FOLKS: CC, #Yankees get pummeled in Game 4 as Tigers sweep #ALCS. Story coming on  #WorstSeriesEver

52.description: Tigers sweep the Yankees! #Pumped #ALCS Tigers off the #WorldSeries

53.description: I am not a tigers fan but they certainly have beaten the Yankees so yay tigers

54.description: The tigers didn't just beat the yankees they demolished the yankees!!! Let's go!!!!!!!!!! #WorldSeriesHereWeCome!

55.description: Yanks and their huge payroll choke again! #Yankees #tigers #worldseries

56.description: “@espn: The Yankees haven’t been swept in a postseason series in 32 years. The Tigers just broke out the brooms.#sweep” :( salt in the wound

57.description: And why is it called goodbye? What's the word "good" for? It's just bye. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye... Bye.

58.description: Yankees need to get guys who can actually play in the postseason

59.description: Yankees swept by the Tigers... Where's a cigarette when you need one?

60.description: bye bye yankees! glad they are out.never been a fan cos of their spending power.

61.description: #detroit #tigers looking awfully good... or were the #yankees just that bad?

62.description: Get your #WorldSeries2012 brooms out because the @tigers just swept the Yankees. #eatemuptigers #DetroitLove

63.description: "@espn: The Yankees haven’t been swept in a postseason series in 32 years. The Tigers just broke out the brooms.#sweep" Go @tigers

64.description: “@espn: The Yankees haven’t been swept in a postseason series in 32 years. The Tigers just broke out the brooms.#sweep”

65.description: THE TIGERS ARE GOING TO THE SERIES.  OH YEA  And such style.  They led the whole way.  What a sweep.  And the Yankees no less.  winning big

66.description: TIGERS!! Way to sweep the Yankees!!

67.description: I'm no Tigers fan but anyone who sweeps the Yankees is good in my book (for the day)

68.description: Way to go #Tigers! Now I won't have to root against the #Yankees in the #Worldseries! #baseball

69.description: The 2 best hitters in baseball celebrating a sweep of the Yankees! #worldseries

70.description: Not the ny times sending me an alert that the Yankees got swept by the Tigers

71.description: “@bostonceltsfan: Nothing better than seeing the Yankees struggle and hopefully sweeped tonight!” Swept?

72.description: I've been saying it all year, Tigers are gonna be World Series Champs, 4 more in a row, and they swept the GOT DAMN YANKEES #RedSoxNation

73.description: #Tigers win the A.L PENNANT Now We At The #WorldSeries Swept The Yankees !

74.description: Tigers sweep the Yankees to win the pennant! YEAH BABY! #GOTIGERS

76.description: So...Why the Yankees Trending and Not the Tigers? That's all I want to know.

77.description: Congratz to the Detroit Tigers on sweeping the Yankees. Now back to reality.

78.description: Just too good for Yankees hell yeah tiger

79.description: Way to go Tigers!!!!!!! Great sweep of the Yankees :D

80.description: Yankees got eliminated from the postseason. Fuck.

81.description: "@espn: The Yankees haven’t been swept in a postseason series in 32 years. The Tigers just broke out the brooms.#sweep" Completely disgusted

83.description: Fuxk the Yankees lol The tigers literally got the broom out and started sweeping

84.description: Hell yea Tigers! Swept the Yankees! 🐯

85.description: Ba bye Yankees! . Hope the Giants get eliminated next.

86.description: Go buy some more players Yankees.

87.description: My 2000th tweet goes out to how proud I am of the Tigers for sweeping the Yankees!

88.description: "@espn: The Yankees haven’t been swept in a postseason series in 32 years. The Tigers just broke out the brooms.#sweep" Makes my day.

89.description: The Yankees are actually awful but Dirks had a day today #MVP #worldseries #sweep #tigers

90.description: Detroit Tigers swept the Yankees! Not a Yankees fan at all so glad they are out!

91.description: Given how many of my friends are Tigers fans, I find their sweep of the Yankees rather enjoyable. Enjoy it Detroit fans.

92.description: FULL STORY: Tigers rout Yankees 8-1 for 4-game ALCS sweep

93.description:
FULL STORY: Tigers rout Yankees 8-1 for 4-game ALCS sweep
  Prince Fielder waved his arms franticly, gleefully calling off his teammates while the crowd at Comerica Park roared.

94.description: Triple Crown Winner, Possible Cy Young Winner, Division Champs, World Series...NOW THATS A SEASON!! #DetroitTigers

95.description: Why is Yankees trending and not the Tigers? Yankees you're old news.

96.description: Yanks haven't been swept in a postseason series in 32 years according to ESPN. Incredible. #History

97.description: Being 10-3 vs the Yankees all time in the playoffs isn't too bad. @Tigers #WorldSeries

98.description: Ugh. I hate the Yankees, but I hate the Tigers more.

99.description: How might one describe that #Tigers sweep of the #Yankees? Perhaps #NotOptimal is the right choice of words?

100.description: Eat em up #Tigers #BlessYouBoys we just swept the #yankees hello #worldseries

101.description: The only bad thing about this is that Sportscenter is now going to talk about the Yankees twice as much as before. #sigh #Tigers

103.description: S/O to @tigers for their sweep of the Yankees

104.description: Tigers rout Yankees 8-1 for 4-game ALCS sweep  @seattletimes #Sports via #newzsocial

105.description: Tigers rout Yankees 8-1 for 4-game ALCS sweep  @seattletimes #Sports via #newzsocial Prince Fielder waved his arms frantically, gleefully calling off his teammates while the crowd at Comerica Park roared.

106.description: Yankees Swept , By the Detroit Tigers .

107.description: Thank you, #Tigers. Your swift defeat of the #Yankees pleases me.

108.description: OOPS! That's the DETROIT TIGERS sweep the Yankees!:-) :-)
